London - Mixlr - F/T

We are hiring an experienced backend/full-stack web developer with deep knowledge of Ruby and Rails.

Mixlr is a platform for social live audio and you will have the opportunity to design and build the next generation of streaming audio software. Experience with JavaScript and interest in Linux server provisioning would be an advantage.

For full information drop us an email with your GitHub profile to jobs <at> mixlr.com. (No recruiters, thanks.)
